channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache SpamAssassin

item.title: CVE-2018-11780|2024-08-05T08:17:09.128Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20spamassassin
item.description: A potential Remote Code Execution bug exists with the PDFInfo plugin in Apache SpamAssassin before 3.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2018-11781|2024-08-05T08:17:09.145Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20spamassassin
item.description: Apache SpamAssassin 3.4.2 fixes a local user code injection in the meta rule syntax.
